scripts.build:bench: vite build --config vite.config.bench.js && xcopy public\avatars dist-bench\avatars\ /E /I /Y && xcopy public\fonts dist-bench\fonts\ /E /I /Y && xcopy images dist-bench\images\ /E /I /Y && copy public\bench-config.js dist-bench\bench-config.js
scripts.postbuild: node scripts/copy404.js && node scripts/copyStatic3d.js && node scripts/copyImages.js && node scripts/copyFonts.js
scripts.build:docs: rimraf docs && npm run build && copy dist\index.html docs\index.html
